import { useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import "../App.css" import { receiveProducts } from '../redux/actions' import BuyProduct from './BuyProduct' function Product({ name, price, inStock ,photoUrl,id}) { const dispatch = useDispatch() console.log(name) dispatch(receiveProducts(name,price,inStock,photoUrl,id)) return (

{name}

Price : {price}$

Number in stock: {inStock}

) } export default Product
